amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Outer Continental Shelf if leasing on such tract would adversely impact any marine mammal from the plan required by paragraph (1).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu amendment (A076) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Lieu.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lieu amendment (A076) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
